ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The authors gratefully acknowledge the Federal Ministry of Education and Research (BMBF) for funding this work. This work was part of the MeLuBat project (03XP0110D) and the LuCaMag project (03EK3051A) in the framework of the “Vom Material zur Innovation” initiative. Open access funding enabled and organized by Projekt DEAL.
